channel.title: How do i
channel.description:
1. How do I copy runescape webpage, like make a website that looks just like runescape.com... I see alot of that and i wish i had 1 =)
2. how do i make my server compatible with all things........ like moparscape... when i log in with moparscape it auto logs me out, its only working on salibs atm.......
3. how do i change the runescape logo? i want to change the RUNE** part of it, but i want it to be the same letters etc.
APPRICIATED!!
;D[br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2007, 03:23:39 PM[/size][hr]Wait a sec........ i created a new character and logged into mopar fine...................... is it the salib items im wearing? skill capes? god sword????
WHATS GOING ON HERE?! Lol

Play RuneScape

16-Oct-2007LootShare
This week we have added an extra feature to the Clan Chat system: LootShare! By switching this option on, all monster drops and rewards will be fairly shared between the clan members fighting with you. LootShare even remembers if you were unlucky enough to receive nothing in a battle, increasing your chance of being lucky next time!
Read more...
09-Oct-2007Back to my Roots quest
Horacio has his heart set on some improvements to his master's already meticulous garden this week. Rather than filling it up with flowers, a patio and some crazy paving, Horacio is after one of the rarest plants on RuneScape. Visit him in East Ardougne to begin this quest.
Read more...
09-Oct-2007Players' Gallery
This month's gallery has a few spooky pictures to remind us Hallowe'en is just around the corner. Curiously, it also has a slight whiff of fish.
Read more...
02-Oct-2007Cutting Edge(ville)
As part of our continuing effort to improve the looks of the 'older' places of RuneScape, our Graphics team have been busy enriching and enhancing above-ground Edgeville.
Read more...
02-Oct-2007Shop Improvement
You'll find that the shops of RuneScape have received a significant makeover this week. Most notably, turning away empty-handed from a shop will be a thing of the past, with infinite stock available from almost every store.
Read more...
Browse the news archives
This website and its contents are copyright © 1999 - 2007 Jagex Ltd.
Use of this website is subject to our Terms+Conditions and Privacy policy
[/code]

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“Bloody Wolf”]1. How do I copy runescape webpage, like make a website that looks just like runescape.com… I see alot of that and i wish i had 1 =)

  1. how do i make my server compatible with all things… like moparscape… when i log in with moparscape it auto logs me out, its only working on salibs atm…

  2. how do i change the runescape logo? i want to change the RUNE** part of it, but i want it to be the same letters etc.

APPRICIATED!!

;D[/quote]

I can Answer 1, Try going to the runescape homepage, Right click it and select " View Source " then Copy the source into a notepad .exe and Hit save as, Save it to the desktop as Runescape.html, Click it to view it if you want but to edit it either, Open it up on a notepad and edit it through there " Must be pretty good at HTML " or if you have Microsoft Frontpage Right click it and hit Edit, And edit it through there.(recommended)

Number 2 - Get a source that doesn’t use Silab Items.

Number 3 - Where do you want to change the Runescape Logo? on the Number 1 topic or on the Silabs Client?

Read full topic
